info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 6 at 11:06AM EDT until May 7 at 9:31PM EDT by NWS Northern Indiana
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio...Indiana...
Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Adams and Van Wert Counties.
Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Williams, Defiance and Fulton OH Counties.
For the Saint Marys River...including Decatur, St. Mary's River near Fort Wayne...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Tiffin River...including Stryker...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Saint Marys River near Decatur.
* WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow.
* IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Agricultural flooding occurs along the river in northern...central and eastern Adams County.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:35 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 17.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes.
The next statement will be issued this evening at 1115 PM EDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW

area.areaDesc: Adams, IN; Allen, IN; Van Wert, OH
